ThingDef.label: wolfsblood elixir
ThingDef.description:
An elixir made from pure werewolf blood, the effect it has on the ingestors body depends on the advancement, or lack, of lycanthropy.

When ingested by those without any traces of lycanthropy, it will infect them with Sanies Lupinus.

When ingested by those that are currently infected by Sanies Lupinus, it strengthen infection, increasing the severity of it

When ingested by those with dormant lycanthropy, it will force a transformation, progressing the disease into full lycanthropy in the process.

When ingested by a lycanthrope, it will temporarily increase the amount of lycanthropic stress they can withstand while transformed.

HediffDef.label: wolfsblood adrenaline
HediffDef.description: A wolfsblood elixir active in ones bloodstream. Temporarily increase the amount of lycanthropic stress they can withstand while transformed.
